abstract: The authors demonstrate the management of erectile impotence by using Papaverin or the combination of Papaverin-Regitin and its overdosing. The overdosing should be put in mind when using these drugs. The authors also demonstrate three types of priapisms. In according to the management of 72 cases priapism, the authors are advising the irrigation of the corpus cavernosum with Dopamin after punction.
title: [Management of drug-induced priapism].
